name: AUGMENTED ATTRIBUTE
description: Improvements to the Alchemical’s mind and body allow her to think and move faster than mortals and other Exalted alike. Each purchase of this Charm upgrades a single Attribute (Force, Finesse, or Fortitude). On Step 1, the Alchemical treats the relevant Attribute as one higher when adding dice with an Excellency, to a maximum of five dice. Upgrade (Essence 2): She gains double 9s on rolls involving her chosen Attribute whenever she uses the mode on her Excellency.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Augmented Attribute
modes.effect: Upgrade a chosen Attribute to treat it as one higher when adding dice via Excellencies. Essence 2 upgrade adds double 9s on applicable rolls.

name: PORTABLE UTILITY COMPARTMENT
description: Spend 1 mote. A compartment opens on the Exalt’s body, and any mundane tools she needs are within. Out of combat, this Charm adds two automatic successes to a related roll. In combat, this Charm supplements a Build Power action, adding 2 Power to the result of the roll.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Portable Utility Compartment
modes.effect: Create needed mundane tools. Adds 2 successes to non-combat rolls or +2 Power to Build Power in combat.

name: ARTIFICER’S KEEN EYE
description: Items the Alchemical creates as part of a venture gain a two-dice bonus when used. Repurchase (Finesse 3): Add an additional equipment tag of your choice to weapons or armor the Alchemical creates.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Artificer’s Keen Eye
modes.effect: Gives +2 dice bonus on using crafted items. Repurchase allows adding a custom equipment tag to items.

name: BATTLE FORM MIMICRY
description: Commit 1 mote. When a target uses a Charm to attack the Alchemical, she may temporarily learn that Charm. Until the fight ends, she may spend 1 Anima plus the Charm’s cost to use it.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Battle Form Mimicry
modes.effect: Mimic opponent’s Charm during combat and reuse it by paying 1 Anima and any mote cost.

name: BETTER THAN NEW
description: Gain two bonus successes on a successful roll to repair an item. These may be used to add a new advantage to the object. Gain 1 anima when taking advantage of this Charm.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Better Than New
modes.effect: +2 successes on repairs, bonus can be used to enhance the item. Gain 1 anima on success.

name: BONE-AND-STEEL DESTRUCTION
description: Spend 2 motes on Step 3. Gain 2 Power on withering attack success, or halve the target's Soak on a decisive attack. Target’s Soak reduced by 2 for the next rounds equal to Essence.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Bone-and-Steel Destruction
modes.effect: +2 Power on withering attack or halve Soak on decisive. Soak penalized afterward based on Essence.

name: CONTINGENCY PREPARATION AXIOM
description: Spend 2 motes. Retry a failed roll immediately using a different Ability’s dice pool. In combat, resets the action to Step 1 and new Charms may be used.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Contingency Preparation Axiom
modes.effect: Upon failure, retry with different Ability/approach. In combat, resets action and allows new Charms.

name: EFFICIENT PLANNING MATRIX
description: Spend 1 mote. Reduce number of obstacles in a venture by one or reduce time scale. ST has final say.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Efficient Planning Matrix
modes.effect: Accelerates project completion by reducing obstacles or shortening time needed.

name: FINE-TUNING
description: Add two bonus successes to prepare Build Power action. Gain 1 anima when benefiting from this Charm.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Fine-Tuning
modes.effect: +2 successes to Build Power preparation. Gain 1 Anima on success.

name: PHASE SHIFTING APPARATUS
description: Spend 1 mote on Step 4 to reflexively move a range band immaterially. Out of combat, commit 1 mote to turn immaterial for a scene. At Essence 3, upgrade to double 9s on clashes and hazard mitigation.

modes.name: Alchemical
modes.title: Phase Shifting Apparatus
modes.effect: Immaterial move during combat or scene-long phasing. Essence 3 upgrade improves clash/hazard rolls.

name: SUBTLE CONCEPT INTRODUCTION METHOD
description: The Exalt plants seeds of an idea in her opponent’s mind. So subtle are her suggestions that the opponent thinks the idea was his own. Spend 1 mote. The Storyteller reveals the target’s Major Virtue. Double 9s on a subsequent social action to instill or persuade the opponent.

name: ADVISOR’S SAGE INSTRUCTION
description: When an organization’s leadership steps down a poorly chosen path, it is the Exalt’s duty to steer them back onto the correct one. Spend 1 mote. The Exalt substitutes her own agenda for that of the group she’s advising. Trivial characters in the scene automatically accept her authority. Add the Alchemical’s Essence in dice to social action rolls to persuade non-trivial characters to adopt her cause as their own, doubling 8s. Gain an additional anima.

name: CELESTIAL OVERSEER CONCORDAT
description: The Machine-God charged the Alchemicals with watching over all Exalted, everywhere. Spend 1 mote. The Alchemical is aware of the nature of other beings in medium range. She may ask one of the following questions: What is their purpose here? Are they attempting to conceal their nature? Is the person they’re speaking with aware of who they are? Does their business interfere with my own? Additional questions cost 1 mote each.

name: EXHAUSTIVE INTERROGATION METHOD
description: Spend 1 mote. Double 8s on read intentions rolls when questioning a character. For each extra success, the character must answer one question with complete honesty. If they reject this influence, the Alchemical gains successes instead of dice as a bonus.

name: FUTURE-PROCLAIMING CANTICLE
description: Spend 1 mote to make a prediction about another character. This takes the form of a short statement which must be fulfilled during the current chapter, though the Storyteller has the final say over its implementation. If used on another player’s character, they may spend Stunt dice to fulfill the prediction. When the prediction comes to pass through Stunt dice, both Alchemical and recipient gain 1 anima.

name: INSIGHTFUL MANAGERIAL APTITUDE
description: Commit 1 mote. The Alchemical names a goal she and her allies are working toward in the immediate scene. For the duration of the scene, reduce the difficulty of related rolls by one.

name: LIFESIGN DETECTING SCAN
description: Spend 1 mote. The Alchemical scans an area out to medium range, learning the target’s location and distance even behind cover. If the target is perfectly concealed, gain two bonus successes on an opposed roll to detect them.

name: MACHINE-GOD PROTECTOR MODE
description: Spend 3 Anima. Instantly move within attack range of an enemy and make a reflexive attack. If the target attacked a member of the community, gain 2 Power and then gain Essence in Power after resolving the attack.

name: MORALE BUILDING DECLARATION
description: Spend 1 mote. Up to the Exalt’s Essence in people gain two bonus dice on their next build power action. Outside of combat, grants two bonus successes on overcoming obstacle rolls. Gain an additional anima.

name: OMNIPRESENT GUARDIAN DIRECTIVE
description: Spend 1 mote. When a battle group the Exalt is leading is attacked, transfer the damage to the Exalt instead.

name: PERFECTED UNION PATTERNING
description: Spend 1 mote. Suggest a plan based on targets’ Intimacies and Virtues. Double 9s on rolls to persuade targets to follow suggestions.

name: PRIORITY-DISCERNING PROTOCOL
description: Spend 1 mote. Learn ambitions and priorities of people in positions of power—up to Essence in targets (1 mote per target). Storyteller reveals targets’ Intimacies toward their organization.

name: RELENTLESS TRACKING PROTOCOL
description: Commit 1 mote. While on a tracking venture, automatically know target’s location each interval. Ignore needs like food or rest while pursuing the quarry.

name: TRUTH-AND-LIES DETECTION
description: Commit 1 mote. For the scene, the player may ask whether a Storyteller character’s statements are true or false or assess emotion from body language. Storyteller must answer truthfully.

name: BODY REWEAVING MATRIX
description: Heal 1 Health per mote spent, up to Exalt’s Essence + Fortitude. Cannot be flurried. If Incapacitated, commit 1 mote to generate 2 Power/turn toward returning to fight.

name: IDENTITY OBFUSCATION MATRIX
description: Commit 1 mote to appear as another identity. Commit 2 motes to hide difficult-to-conceal implants. Repurchase: Spend 1 mote to perfectly mimic another character’s voice and inflection.

name: MATERIAL RESISTANCE PROCEDURE
description: Spend 1 mote on Step 5. Add +2 Soak vs mundane weapons, or Essence to Soak vs magical material weapons matching caste.

name: OUTLIER ANALYSIS METHOD
description: Gain 2 extra Stunt dice for Awareness, Embassy, or Sagacity rolls to solve problems. Gifting the dice grants 1 anima.

name: OPTICAL SHROUD
description: Commit 1 mote to become invisible and gain 2 automatic Stealth successes. Commit second mote to gain Concealment in combat. Lasts scene or until ended.

name: REINFORCED CHASSIS
description: Spend 1 mote. On Step 2, choose Soak or Defense. That stat cannot drop below 3 until start of next turn.

name: TERRAFORMING PROTOCOL
description: Spend 1 mote to ignore environment/terrain penalties for Essence rounds. Or commit 1 mote to create terrain hazard in close range of opponent.

name: VERBATIM RECALL
description: Spend 1 mote. Recall and repeat conversations exactly, including voices. Gain Fortitude in automatic successes for memory or mimicry and may exceed dice limits by 2.
